intro: Chlorophytum rigidum, commonly known as the rigid spider plant, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asparagaceae family and is characterized by its sword-shaped, stiff leaves that are typically green with white stripes. The plant produces small, white, bell-shaped flowers that bloom in spring. It is a hardy, low-maintenance plant that thrives in well-drained soil and bright, indirect light. Chlorophytum rigidum is often used in landscaping and as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and ease of care.
